name: Multiple Linux / Unix Post Sudo Upgrade Shell
author: todb <todb@metasploit.com>
Ryan Baxendale <rbaxendale@gmail.com>
description:
This module attempts to upgrade a shell account to UID 0 by reusing the
          given password and passing it to sudo. This technique relies on sudo
          versions from 2008 and later which support -A.

options.name: WORKSPACE
options.description: Specify the workspace for this module

options.name: SESSION
options.description: The session to run this module on.

options.name: PASSWORD
options.description: The password to use when running sudo.
